name: RpgM Legends: Dear Brave Heart
description:
One thousand years ago, the great mage Solomon sealed off 72 Greater Demons and peace returned to the world.  Now, the demons are stirring again, but there is hope.  Warriors who are descendants of Solomon and who can control the Legendary Soul Cards have begun to appear. Our story follows a young warrior, Ethelion, who, with his partner, Silvia, are sent by the Adventurers Guild to Elgiza Isle.  There have been reports of three of the Greater Demons appearing on the Isle and someone has gone missing. Their journey will begin in the village of Duske.

This game is part of the RpgM Legends Intiative:

Twenty six years ago American gamers were introduced to the first official Rpg Maker engine for consoles which was released on the PlayStation on November 27, 1997.  It would have 3 more English releases for consoles. Rpg Maker 2 (August 8, 2002) and Rpg Maker 3 (December 16, 2004) were both released on Playstation 2, and, the more recent, Rpg Maker MV  (September 8, 2020) on Playstation 4.

Each one of the first three had a demo game that came with it, where you could learn the basics of what you could do with each engine.  All three games were actually rather enjoyable in there own way.  So much so, that I feel like they should be shared with the world.

I'll be creating them in the order 3, 1, and then 2 cause I feel like they become harder to program in that order.
